mapper.insert: insert into KJH_Board (id, title, content, userId, updatedate, regdate) values (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update KJH_BOARD set viewcount= viewcount+1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KJH_Board ORDER BY id ASC
